EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Information (1330445697.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Bart, Cynthia from Crescent Solutions sent me an email this morning saying that you were ready to move forward and to reach out to you with next steps. Have you finished your negotiations with them? Please let me know where you are in the process and we can then talk about next steps if you are ready to move forward. Thank you,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: <bbentley@mbopartners.com">ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Bart Stough [mailto:itsolutions@cjems.com] Sent: Thursday, February 23, 2012 10:54 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Information On 2/22/2012 2:13 PM, Nicolette Taylor wrote: Hi Bart, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful as discussed: - We have created an index of past webinars on topics specifically catered for independent consultants. You can view our index by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCckVKuktj%2F%2FWWLLrNnD%2FFd4vmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D"><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;color:blue;mso-no-proof:yes>.
- In addition we have a 2012 Webinar track that will cover everything to do with working independently. We have three tracks, you can sign up to receive notifications when new webinars are scheduled by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/Webinar.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCckVKuktj%2F%2FWWLLrNnD%2FFd4vmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D"><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;color:blue;mso-no-proof:yes>.
- Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCckVKuktj%2F%2FWWLLrNnD%2FFd4vmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D"><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;color:blue;mso-no-proof:yes>. Once you are ready to follow up, please schedule a convenient time for you using my postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCckVKuktj%2F%2FWWLLrNnD%2FFd4vmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D">online schedule. I look forward to speaking with you soon! Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify <span style='font-size:7.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Georgia","serif"> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. Good morning Nicolette,
Please write up an estimate using 140 hrs at 95/100 respectively. In addition, please talk to your expense experts on the legality of continuing to receive per diem at this location even though I am technically with a different company. I would refer them to IRS pub 463 on this. If I can't be guaranteed that I won't get in trouble from the IRS by doing this, it most likely will not work.
